alternativeNames: Chen, Xin Qi; Chen, Shing Chi; Chen, Sing-Chi
examples: Tangtsinia S.C. Chen in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 10: 194 (1965).
source: Index Herbariorum, ed. 8.(1990).  Index Herb. Sin.: 399, 188 (1993). Novon, 8(4): 461 (1998). Death year from: David E. Boufford (GH); birth and death dates from Orchidee (Hamburg) 72(3): 223.
